div.p: While sitting at the table, this bundle was delivered to me.
However, since I have to leave immediately after lunch and a messenger from Constance happened to be present, I handed it over to him.
I cannot add more due to the lack of time. A diet has been proclaimed here; I think it will not take place.
Georg von Stetten, your most observant. To the venerable and learned Lord Heinrich Bullinger, his esteemed lord and friend.
To Master Heinrich Bullinger in Zurich.
